message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's important to reach an agreement early so we both benefit!
Your offer was a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle? This ensures we both get a decent share before inflation eats into it too much.
Bob, we're running out of time and the value is decreasing quickly. My offer is still 60/40. It's a fair deal considering the inflation working against you.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.  Any more stalling and inflation will hurt us both.
